title: Old Post Office Tower: Park Home
body: Old Post Office Tower Closed during Renovations  Built in 1899, the Old Post Office's clock tower offers panoramic views of Washington, D.C.Â  The tower houses the Congress Bells, a Bicentennial gift from England commemorating friendship between the nations. The Tower is closed until late 2016 as the entire building is currently undergoing major renovations. Read More             Old Post Office Tower Constuction   The Old Post Office Tower is currently closed for major renovations and construction.
